Package dev.galactic.star.tools

Class ObjectSerializer

java.lang.Object
dev.galactic.star.tools.ObjectSerializer
public class ObjectSerializer extends Object
The way to serialize objects. NOTE: The class you want to serialize needs to implement Java's Serializable Interface or else you will get a NotSerializableException.
Author:
PrismoidNW
